name: Basketball Games
description:
Basketball brings the most popular street basketball machine to your mobile. Tap as fast and accurate as you can in limited time to make a high score.

Touch a ball and fling it towards the basket to shoot the ball!

Game Features:
- Arcade Mode: Score as many points as possible within the given time.With each level cleared, the game play will change, with the level of difficulty increasing with each stage.

-Precision mode: Don't miss or you will have to start over.

- Side to side basket movement for challenging play.

- Bright and vibrant graphics&effects.

Get it now and you’ll never feel bored.
